short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See what today’s purchases cost you in tomorrow’s dollars.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bank account not looking as thick as you’d like? Need a little reminder to invest in you before you pay them?

Meet BreadUp – your cheeky, irreverent Gen Z money coach, ready to slap you with a healthy dose of reality when you need it most. 

If there’s one thing you’ll get right from now on, you’re gonna get your $#%&$!* bread up.


What BreadUp Does:

– Cheeky Reminders: When you get to online checkout, BreadUp pops up with a sweet little reminder of how your purchase amount could grow if you invested it.
– Comical Insights: Irreverent, sarcastic comments to make you laugh while you get your spending habits in line.
– Historical Data: BreadUp updates your financial insights based on your spending amounts and real data to help you visualize the power of compounding.

Why BreadUp?

– Turn Regrets into Rewards: Stop wasting money on fleeting trends and start building your financial future.
– Simple and Fun: BreadUp’s irreverent coaching turns building your wealth into a laughing matter.
– Effortless Integration: Works seamlessly with your browser to provide instant reminders without disrupting your shopping experience.

Your future self deserves better than a life of regrets and microwave ramen. Get your bread up.
